How to play: Tap and hold to make the student move to the right and release to make it go to the left. 
 
 You have 3 lives! 
 
 Catch: 
 
 A: Gives a life or 50 points if you already have 3 lives. 
 
 B: Gives 30 points 
 
 C: Gives 10 points 
 
 Avoid: 
 
 D: Takes 35 points 
 
 F: Takes a life
